title: Tomato Relish
ingredients: 4 quarts ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped
instructions: Combine all ingredients in large pot. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Ladle into hot sterilized jars, leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Process in boiling water bath for 15 minutes.
storage: Store in cool, dark place. Refrigerate after opening.
